data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=n24bVJBsCDEQ7kNvgFKsa-K&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfAYE000mc5vBmCgcRNgRcluTU326wBt9TBYZBZKVqzHPw&oe=663A111C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031471_450514160975639_7876978019992583284_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7nl-DbCq52AQ7kNvgG8W-O4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfBdjSPNboKJbg--cDgJiJF4tat7fZskVTu6ljPeIRJFXg&oe=6639F10C)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75210396_1168100270905037_6056515960548689783_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=B0tcUNdYCCkQ7kNvgHvoVYg&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfAOGfpSf0y1MrFmWCQ0mF_dIC-smoqZtoI7eKXQkEQQQg&oe=6639F6A4)
Dive into a breathtaking experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982554_1365777981490507_857979718693496025_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YAGtc5R0dBkQ7kNvgH_J4P1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfDkoie_1HcFild9022mmvSgeXtbsWQgshnrpg-G5R_pPg&oe=663A0308)
![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gg96bIS996gQ7kNvgG9jSwJ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCoegTniSjJvKP-wVY13by-3aXkov6wocCMhaqTNHXiPw&oe=663A2158)

Celebrated for its cinematic narrative and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035438_923857099517367_6431578607880239089_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=VtSrWUkTeMcQ7kNvgHJ8ZMY&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfBca0dPS2cVMgwrD8TN7TrcxC1FQ5Mj3Q5IRryKcNdgGg&oe=6639F113)

![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YPYwDy-thqIQ7kNvgFJ2oeD&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfDvVXduBrjAUN4BelxnTZQpFown5QUUstj85nWDpqY_6A&oe=663A03F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75295893_804268758252860_8856952948920548753_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=3Amzl4_3xRYQ7kNvgHDST_j&_nc_oc=AdgU-8QZhstQCBkJUkXp3lIHyVmWrA9UxfUBntxMl9tOzecyRK3ihfigLgCbfUHVlwg&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfA_8xw52H03QV3hON77ng5VcH4fpfp4tZNduFEB7ZgByg&oe=663A196B)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=dRA96liGe_8Q7kNvgFhnetY&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfAoFzmy1OqheIeCZUqdzt3rTRKBNvjakQ66gb0gXNfSTg&oe=663A0217)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë

![{"height":702,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982658_417699267880520_1132379095717972405_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LK0bDqg1nIgQ7kNvgEb-tVJ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCtKQCrk8g0pzD4tM5y1QtAU3PFxMPTbX23lmS0-tjiHw&oe=6639ECD1)
